text:
[Indrajith starts to fight again with Rama and Lakshmana. Lakshmana wants to use Brahmastra and Rama objects to him and reflects on the means of assailing Indrajith. Indrajith conducts a fire sacrifice before starting to fight.]

मकराक्षंहतंश्रुत्वारावणस्समितिञ्जयः ।

रोषेणमहताविष्टोदन्ताङ्कटकटाय्य च ।।6.80.1।।

कोपितश्चतदातत्रकिंकार्यमितिचिन्तयन् ।

आदिदेशाथसङ्क्रुद्धोरणायेजितंसुतम् ।।6.80.2।।
meaning: समितिञ्जयःone who is always victorious in war, रावणः Ravana, मकराक्षम् Maka raksha, हतम् killed, श्रुत्वा on hearing, महता highly, रोषेण enraged, आविष्टःengrossed in, दन्तान् teeth, कटकटाय्य च grinding, कुपितश्च in anger, तदा then, तत्र there, किम् what, कार्यम् deed, इति this, चिन्तयन् thinking, अथ and then, सङ्क्रुद्धःangry, सुतम्son, इन्द्रजितम् Indrajith, रणाय to battle, आदिदेश commanded
translation: Ravana, who was always victorious in warhearing that Maka raksha had been killed, became highly enraged and grinding his teeth in anger was engrossed in thinking. He commanded his son Indrajith to go to battle.

text:
[Indrajith starts to fight again with Rama and Lakshmana. Lakshmana wants to use Brahmastra and Rama objects to him and reflects on the means of assailing Indrajith. Indrajith conducts a fire sacrifice before starting to fight.]

मकराक्षंहतंश्रुत्वारावणस्समितिञ्जयः ।

रोषेणमहताविष्टोदन्ताङ्कटकटाय्य च ।।6.80.1।।

कोपितश्चतदातत्रकिंकार्यमितिचिन्तयन् ।

आदिदेशाथसङ्क्रुद्धोरणायेजितंसुतम् ।।6.80.2।।
meaning: समितिञ्जयःone who is always victorious in war, रावणः Ravana, मकराक्षम् Maka raksha, हतम् killed, श्रुत्वा on hearing, महता highly, रोषेण enraged, आविष्टःengrossed in, दन्तान् teeth, कटकटाय्य च grinding, कुपितश्च in anger, तदा then, तत्र there, किम् what, कार्यम् deed, इति this, चिन्तयन् thinking, अथ and then, सङ्क्रुद्धःangry, सुतम्son, इन्द्रजितम् Indrajith, रणाय to battle, आदिदेश commanded
translation: Ravana, who was always victorious in warhearing that Maka raksha had been killed, became highly enraged and grinding his teeth in anger was engrossed in thinking. He commanded his son Indrajith to go to battle.

meaning: वीर valiant, अदृश्यःinvisible, दृश्यमानोवाor visible, महावीर्यौ great heroes, भ्रातरौ brothers, रामलक्ष्मणौRama and Lakshmana, जहि destroy, सर्वाथा always, त्वम् you, बलाधिकः superior
translation: "Oh, Valiant son! You destroy the two heroic brothers, Rama and Lakshmana, by being visible or invisible as you are always superior to them."

meaning: त्वम् you, संयुगे in battle, अप्रतिमकर्माणम् by incomparable deeds, इन्द्रम् Indra, जयसि won, संयुगे in combat, मानुषौ men, दृष्टवा seeing, किंपुनः why again, न वधिष्यसिnot kill them
translation: "You have won the battle with Indra of incomparable deeds. Why not kill men, onseeing them in combat?"

meaning: राक्षसेन्द्रेण Lord of Rakshasas, तथा thus, उक्तःspoken, सःhe, इन्द्रजित्Indrajith, पितुःfather's, वचःwords, प्रतिगृह्य respecting, यज्ञभूमौ place for offering oblations in fire, विधिवत् as per tradition, पावकम् fire sacrifice, जुहव did
translation: Hearing the words spoken by the Lord of Rakshasas, Indrajith respecting the command poured oblations in the fireas per tradition before proceeding.

meaning: तत्र thereafter, अग्निम् fire, जुह्वतः च अपि went to the place of sacrifice, रक्तोष्णीषधराःred coloured head dresses, स्त्रियःwomen, रावणिः Rakshasa women, यत्र to that place, तत्र there, सम्भ्रान्ताः to wear, आजग्मुः brought
translation: Thereafter, as he went to the place of fire sacrifice, Rakshasa women brought red coloured head dresses to wear (for the priests).

meaning: शरपत्राणि grass, शस्त्राणि weapons, विभीतकाः wooden pieces, समिधः as sticks for offering, अथ and, लोहितानि red coloured, वासांसि clothes, यथा so also, कार्ष्णायसम् iron containers, स्रुवम् as ladles
translation: Then, in that fire sacrifice, weapons as grass, wooden pieces as sticks for offering into fire, redcoloured clothes for the priests to wear, and so also iron containers as ladles to offer in fire were used.

meaning: अग्निंसर्वतःon all sides of fire sacrifices, सतोमरैः spread with weapons, शरपत्रैः grass, समास्तीर्य for the sake of offering in fire, जीवतः live, सर्वकृष्णस्य entirely dark in colour, छागस्य goat, गळम् neck, जग्राह consigned
translation: Weapons were spread on all sides of the fire sacrifice like grass. A darkcoloured live goat's neck was consigned for offering into fire.

meaning: सकृत् by that action, होमसमिद्धस्य sacrificial fire, विधूमस्य by the smoke, महार्चिषः mighty flames, विजयम् signs of victory, दर्शयन्ति appeared, तानि in that, लिङ्कानि signs of, बभूवुःaroused
translation: By that action of fire sacrifice, the mighty flames and the smoke that appeared from the mighty smokeless fire signifying victory appeared.

meaning: प्रदक्षिणावर्तशिखः flames of fire going round, तप्तहाटकसन्निभः like refined gold, पावकः fire, स्वयम् by itself, उत्थितःarose, तत् that, हविः offerings into fire, प्रतिजग्राह received
translation: The flames of fire going round the fire by itself which closely resembled refined gold, received the offerings into fire.

meaning: अग्निम् into fire, हुत्वा having offered, अथ and then, देवदानवराक्षसान् Devas, Danavas, and Rakshasas तर्पयित्वा offering, अन्तर्धानगतम् disappeared, शुभम् auspicious, रथश्रेष्ठम् best of chariots, आरुरोह ascended
translation: Having offered fire that way, and gratified Devas, Danavas and Rakshasas, he (Indrajith) ascended the best of chariots and disappeared.

meaning: चतुर्भिः the four, वाजिभिःhorses, निशितैःsharp, बाणैः arrows, युतःfitted, आरोपितमहाचापः mighty bow, सः he, स्यन्दनोत्तमःshining exquisitely, शुशुभे charming
translation: Drawn by horses, fitted with sharp mighty bows, the chariot was shining exquisitely and looked charming.

meaning: वपुषा incarnated, जाज्वल्यमानःglittering, तपनीयपरिच्छदःcovered with golden, सः that, रथःchariot, मृगैःimages of antelopes, चन्द्रार्धचन्द्रैश्च full moon and crescents as inscriptions, समलङ्कृतःdecorated
translation: The chariot was glittering incarnated with gold covered with images offull moon, crescent moon inscriptions and decorated with images of antelopes.

meaning: जाम्बूनदमहाकम्बुःrings of gold, दीप्तपावकसन्निभः glowing like fire, इन्द्रजितःIndrajith, केतुः standard, वैडूर्यसमलङ्कृतःadorned with gems of Vydurya, बभूव it was
translation: Like flaming fire in appearance, the chariot was provided with rings of gold, the standard of the chariot was adorned with gems of Vydurya.

meaning: आदित्यकल्पेन effulgent as the orbit of the sun, तेनब्रह्मार्स्तेण by that weapon of Brahma, पालितःruled, सुमहाबलः of mighty prowess, सःरावणिःRavani son of Ravana, दुराधर्षःdifficult to gain over, बभूवappeared
translation: Protected by the weapon of Brahma, effulgent as the orbit of the Sun, the son of Ravana was endowed with mighty prowess and was difficult to gain over.

meaning: समितिञ्जयःwho had acquired the power of being victorious in the wars, सःइन्द्रजित् Indrajith, राक्षसैःfor Rakshasas, by Rakshasas मन्त्रै: uttering ritualistic verses, अग्निम् in fire, हुत्वा offering, नगरात् from the city, अभिनिर्याय departed, अन्तर्धानगतःdisappeared, अब्रवीत् bragged as follows
translation: Indrajith who had acquired the power of being victorious in the wars departed, after uttering ritualistic verses which are known to Rakshasas only and making an offering into fire disappeared and bragged as follows.

meaning: यौ in which, वने forest, मिध्याप्रव्रजितौ who are in exile in vain, तौ those two, रणए in war, अद्य now, हत्वा end, पित्रे father, रावणाय Ravana's, रणार्जितम् earned by waging war, जयम् victory, प्रदास्यामिwill give
translation: "Having put an end to war, and the two princes who are in exile in the forest in vain, I will present the victory earned to my father now."

meaning: अद्य now, उर्वीम् earth, निर्वानरां devoid of monkeys, रामम् Rama, लक्ष्मणं च and Lakshmana, हत्वा killing, परमाम् supreme, प्रीतिम् joy, करिष्ये provide, इति thus, उक्त्वा having spoken, अन्तरधीयत invisible
translation: 'Making the earth devoid of monkeys, killing Rama and Lakshmana, I will provide supreme joy to my father now', saying so he became invisible.

meaning: तीक्षणकार्मुकनाराचैः equipped with sharp bows, रणे in war, तीक्षणः sharp, इन्द्ररिपुः Indra's enemy, दशग्रीवेण tenheaded, चोदितःdirected by, अथ and then, सङ्कृद्धःfuriously, पपात rushed
translation: Directed by the ten headed Ravana, enemy of Indra, equipped with sharp bows Indrajith rushed furiously.

meaning: सः he, महावीर्यौ great hero, त्रिशिरसा like three, नागौइव like serpents, इषुजालानि discharging arrows, सृजन्तौ raining, वानरमध्यगौ in the midst of Vanaras, वीरौ heroes, ददर्श saw
translation: That great hero saw Rama and Lakshmana like three serpents in the midst of Vanaras raining network of arrows.

meaning: इमौ these, तौ two, इतिrecognising, सञ्चिन्त्य stringing, कार्मुकम् the bow, सज्जम् fastening, कृत्वा affixing, वृष्टिमान् raining cloud, पर्जन्यःइव like rain, इषुदाराभिः with continuous flow of arrows, सन्ततान covered
translation: Recognising the two princes, stringing his bow, and fastening, affixing he showered a continuous flow of arrows like rain from rain clouds and covered them.

meaning: सरथःriding in the aerial car, सःhe, वैहायसम् from the sky, प्राप्य released, आचक्षुर्विषये remaining out of sight, तिष्ठन् standing, निशितैःpointed, शरैः arrows, रामलक्ष्मणौ on Rama and Lakshmana, विव्याधtormented
translation: Riding in the aerial car, Indrajith remaining out of sight released pointed arrows from the sky and tormented Rama and Lakshmana standing in the battlefield.

meaning: तस्य by the, शरवेगेन speed of the arrows, परीतौ covered, तौरामलक्ष्मणौ both Rama and Lakshman, धनुषी bows, सशरे and arrows, कृत्वा discharging, दिव्यम् wonderful, अस्त्रम् weapon, प्रचक्रतुः exhibited
translation: Covered by the speed of the arrows released on them, both Rama and Lakshmana wielding their bows and arrows discharged wonderful arrows and exhibited their power.

meaning: महाबलौ mighty, शरजालैःnet of arrows, गगनम् sky, प्रच्छादयन्तौcovering, सूर्यसङ्काशैःresembling sun, अस्त्रःweapons, शरैः arrows, तम् they, न पस्पृशतुःnot touch
translation: Though the mighty Rama and Lakshmana were covering the sky with their arrows resembling the sun they could not touch Indrajith.

meaning: सःhe, सभःsky, प्रच्छादयन् obscured, धूमान्धकारम् darkness through smoke, चक्रे did, श्रीमान् glorious, नीहारतमसाdarkness through fog, वृताःsurrounded, दिशश्च directions, अन्तर्दधे invisible
translation: The glorious Indrajith obscured the sky by making it dark through smoke and fog and made the surrounding directions invisible.

text:
नैवज्यातलनिर्घोषा न च नेमिखुरस्वनः ।

शुश्रुवेचरतस्तस्य न च रूपंप्रकाशते ।।6.80.26।।
meaning: तस्य his, चरतः movement, ज्यातलनिर्घोषःsound produced by the palms, नैवशुश्रुवे nor the sounds, निमुखरसर्वनःच of the wheels or ho of s of horses, न च not heard, रूपं च form also, न प्रकाशते not visible
translation: While Indrajith was moving, neither the sounds produced by palms or of the wheels or the hoof s were heard and the form was also not visible.,

meaning: महाबाहुः mighty armed, सःhe, घानन्धकारे like the darkness of clouds, तिमिरे darkness, नाराचशरवृष्टिभिःrain of rocks and hails of steel arrows, अद्भुतम् wonderful, शरवर्षमिव rain of arrows, ववर्ष showered
translation: The mighty armed Indrajith showered rocks and hails of steel arrows in that pitch darkness like the darkness of clouds.

meaning: समरे in conflict, क्रुद्धःangry, सः he, रावणिः Ravana's son, दत्तवरैःboons bestowed, सूर्यसङ्काशैः effulgent as the sun, शरैः arrows, रामम् on Rama, सर्वगात्रेषु all over the limbs, भृशम् grievously, विव्याध pierced
translation: In that conflict, the enraged son of Ravana, pierced all over Rama's limbs, with arrows bestowed to him, which were as effulgent as the Sun.

meaning: धाराभिः flow of arrows, पर्वतौइव like two mountains, नाराचैःsteel arrows, हन्यमानौ tormented, नरव्याघ्रौ tiger among humans, तौ two of them, हेमपुङ्खान् golden shafted arrows, तिग्मान् sharp pointed, शरान् arrows, मुमुचतुःreleased
translation: The tigers among humans, Rama, and Lakshmana, like two mountains hit by steel arrows, released sharp pointedgold shafted steel arrows and tormented (Indrajith).

meaning: कङ्कपत्रिणः arrows fixed with swords, ते those, पतगाः wings, अन्तरिक्षेः sky, रावणिम् at Ravana's son, समासाद्य reaching, निकृत्य piercing him, शोणितोक्षिताः soaked in blood, भूमौ on ground, पेतुःfell
translation: The arrows fixed with swords like wings, reaching Ravana's son in the sky pierced him and he fell down soaked in blood.

meaning: शरौघेण by the mass of arrows, अतिमात्रम् brightened, पीड्यमानौ hurt, नरोत्तमौ best of men, पततःfalling, तान् them, इषून् arrows, अनेकैःnumerous, भल्लैःBhallas, विचकर्ततुःtear
translation: Brightened by the mass of arrows on their body, the best of men, Rama and Lakshmana began to tear the numerous arrows called Bhallas.

meaning: तौ both, यतः that way, निपतितान् falling, शितान् sharp, शरान् arrows, ददृशाते from which direction, ततः then, तौ they both दाशरथी on sons of Dasharatha, उत्तमम् best, अस्त्रम् weapon, ससृजातेdirected
translation: Both the sons of Dasharatha, directed their best weapons in the direction from where arrows were falling on two of them.

meaning: अतिरथःgood chariot warrior, रावणिस्तु son of Ravana also, रथेन from the aerial car, सर्वाः all, दिशःdirections, आपतत् coursed, लघ्वस्त्रः swift in discharging, तौदाशरथी two sons of Dasharatha, निशितैः pointed, शरैः arrows, विव्याध pierced
translation: The son of Ravana who was a superior chariot warrior and swift in discharging arrows coursed through all directions and pierced arrows at Rama and Lakshmana from the aerial car.

meaning: सुसम्हतैः wellmade fully stretched, रुक्मपुङ्खैः gold shafted arrows, तेन by that, अतिविद्धौ severely hurt, वीरौ heroes, तौदाशरथी both sons of Dasharatha, पुष्पितौ in blossom, किंशुकौइव like Kimsuka, बभूवतुःappeared
translation: Both the sons of Dasharatha looked like fully blossomed Kimsuka trees (blood flowing from the body) pierced by wellmade gold shafted arrows.

meaning: वाभ्रसम्प्लवे thickly cast with clouds, सूर्यस्येव except the position of sun, अस्य his, वेगगतिम् swift movement, कचशित् is not known, न neither, रूपम् form, धनुःbow, शरान् arrows, न not, अन्यत् other than, किञ्चित् even a little, न विदितम् not visible
translation: When the clouds are cast thickly, except the position of the Sun, nothing is visible. So also, with a swift movement of Indrajith, neither his form nor his bow and arrows were visible.

meaning: तेन then, विद्धाःstruck, हरयः monkeys, निहताःkilled, गतासवः ceased of life, शतशःhundreds, तत्र there, धरणीतले on ground, पतिताःfallen, बभूवुःseen
translation: Then, monkeys struck and killed, lifelessin hundreds fell on the ground.

meaning: ततः there, लक्ष्मणस्तु even Lakshmana, सङ्क्रृद्धः enraged, भ्रातरम् brother, वाक्यम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke, सर्वरक्षसाम् all the Rakshasas, वधार्थम् will kill, ब्राह्मम् अस्त्रम् by Brahma's weapon, प्रयोक्ष्यामिwill use
translation: Then Lakshmana also, enraged, spoke to his brother, saying," I will kill all the Rakshasas using the weapon of Brahma."

meaning: ततः then, रामः Rama, शुभलक्षणम् gifted with auspicious signs, तंलक्ष्मणम् that Lakshmana, उवाच said, एकस्यहेतोः for the sake of one, पृथिव्याम् on the earth, रक्षांसि Rakshasas, हन्तुम् killing, न अर्हसि ought not
translation: To Lakshmana, gifted with auspicious signs, Rama said" for the sake of killing one Rakshasa, you are not to kill all the Rakshasas on the earth."

meaning: इह here, त्वम् you, अयुध्यमानम् without waging war, प्रच्छन्नम् not fighting, has hidden, प्राञ्जलिम् folded palms, शरणागतम् one who surrenders, पलायमानम् one who runs away, मत्तंवा not alert, हन्तुम् to kill, न अर्हसिought not
translation: "You should not kill anyone who is not waging war, not fighting and hidden, one with folded palms surrendered, one who runs away from war and not alert in war"

meaning: महाभुज mighty armed, अस्यैव I will, वधे kill, यत्नम् effort, करिष्यावःwill make, महावेगान् endowed with high speed, आशीविषोपमान् venomous serpents, अस्त्रान् weapons, आदेक्ष्यावःwill command
translation: "O mighty armed Lakshmana! I will make an effort to kill Indrajith by commanding weapons like venomous serpents endowed with high speed."

meaning: मायिनम् conjurer, क्षुद्रम् mean, अन्तर्हितरथम् invisible with chariot तमेनं if seen, एनम् in any way, राक्षसम् Rakshasa, दृष्टवा seeing, वानरयूथपाःVanara troops, बलात् strength, निहनिष्यन्ति forcibly kill
translation: " A conjurer, mean, and invisible Indrajith with the chariot, if seen, in any way the Vanara troops will forcibly kill him with their strength."

meaning: यद्येषः by himself, भूमिम् into earth, विशतेयदिenters also, दिवंवा heaven or, रसातलंवापि underground, नभस्तलंवा subterranean world, एवम् in that way, निगूढोऽपि remains hidden, ममmy, अस्त्रदग्धःweapon, गतासुः consumed, भूमितले on the ground, पतिष्यतेwill fall
translation: "If he enters into earth, heaven or the underground world or the subterranean world or remains hidden, my weapon will consume him, and he will fall on earth."
